thread.section_title: Zip Scanners Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Zip Scanners | zipscanners.com
thread.title: Frank M
thread.title_full: Zip Scanners reviewed by Frank M

author: Frank M
title: Frank M
text: After buying and using scanners for years, I compared prices and reviews of other dealers and decided I would give Zip Scanners a try. They are one of the few dealers that actually respond to reviews and seem to care about their customers and the reputation of their business. Ordered the scanner and 3 days later it was in my hands. I look forward to making more purchases through them.... GREAT JOB!
